1.title: Decorative Upholstery
details: Suitable for decorative upholstery.
Recommended usage level should be specified for each case.
Printed fabrics can be used for decorative purposes.

2.title: Upholstery
details: Suitable for upholstery.
Recommended usage level should be specified for each case.
Dyed fabrics are well suited for general upholstery use.

3.title: Curtains
details: Suitable for curtains.
Most of our fabrics are made with natural fibers and eco-friendly dyes.
It is recommended to line curtains to protect them from sunlight.

4.title: Blinds
details: Suitable for blinds.
Continuous exposure to sunlight can damage fabrics; protect blinds from direct sun.
We recommend installing blinds indoors, covered by an additional curtain or blackout layer.

5.title: Bedspreads
details: Suitable for bedspreads.
It is advisable to back the main fabric with a lining and, if desired, a foam interlining.
Washing instructions must be followed. Contact our research department for precise care guidelines.

6.title: FR (Flame Retardant)
details: Flame resistant.
FR fabrics are designed not to ignite or spread flames, providing protection in hazardous environments such as electrical or petrochemical industries.
Flame resistance is durable and maintained through use and washes.

7.title: IMO (Maritime Use)
details: Suitable for maritime use.
IMO fabrics comply with maritime safety standards, being flame retardant and designed for use on ships and vessels.
These fabrics offer fire protection and are mandatory in maritime environments for onboard safety.

8.title: Outdoor (Exterior Use)
details: Suitable for outdoor use.
Outdoor fabrics are designed to withstand weather conditions like sun, rain, and humidity.
They are durable, UV- and mold-resistant, and easy to maintain—ideal for garden furniture and awnings.

9.title: Paste-the-wall
details: This wallpaper should be hung by applying paste directly to the back of the paper and allowing it to soak in before hanging.
This traditional hanging method requires more steps than other adhesive techniques.

10.title: Free-match
details: This type of wallpaper does not require pattern matching. Simply hang the strips in any order and the pattern aligns itself, resulting in less waste.

11.title: Moderate Light Fastness
details: Avoid hanging wallpapers with moderate light fastness in areas exposed to significant sunlight, as they will fade more quickly.

12.title: Strippable When Dry
details: Dry-strippable wallpaper allows the top layer to be peeled off the wall, leaving the backing behind when removed.
This paper can also be removed when dry without the need for water or steam.

1.title: Machine Wash 30°C
details: Machine washable at 30°C.
Do not use detergents containing bleach.
Do not mix with other colors.

2.title: Machine Wash 40°C
details: Machine washable at 40°C.
Do not use detergents containing bleach.
Do not mix with other colors.

3.title: Not Machine Washable
details: If indicated, we recommend hand washing or dry cleaning according to specified instructions.
Machine washing may cause damage or shrinkage.

4.title: Iron at 120°C
details: It is recommended to iron the fabric on the reverse side up to 120°C.

5.title: Iron at 160°C
details: It is recommended to iron the fabric on the reverse side up to 160°C.

6.title: Iron at 210°C
details: It is recommended to iron the fabric on the reverse side up to 210°C.

7.title: Do Not Iron
details: Special fibers are used in this fabric.
No ironing is needed to maintain its appearance; steaming is recommended instead.

8.title: Hand Wash
details: Suitable for hand washing in lukewarm water.
Use only mild transparent soap.
Do not use unauthorized cleaning agents.
Do not mix with other colors.

9.title: Do Not Bleach
details: None of our fabrics should be treated with bleach.
Bleach will alter the original color of the fabric.

10.title: Dry Clean
details: Suitable for dry cleaning without perchloroethylene.
Use professional upholstery cleaning services.

11.title: Do Not Dry Clean
details: Not suitable for perchloroethylene dry cleaning.
Only specialized professional services should perform dry cleaning.

12.title: Do Not Tumble Dry
details: After machine washing, hang fabrics to air dry.
Tumble drying may cause shrinkage and damage.

13.title: Easy Clean
details: Fabrics with EASY CLEAN technology allow quick and easy stain removal.
Most stains can be removed with water and mild soap.

14.title: Tumble Dry
details: Suitable for tumble drying.
Recommended on a low heat setting to avoid fabric damage.

15.title: Hang to Dry
details: Suitable for vertical drying.
Ideal for preventing wrinkles and maintaining the fabric’s original shape.
